projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with Next.js, featuring user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather application that provides current weather conditions, forecasts, and interactive maps using multiple APIs.

projects.title: Automation Bot
projects.description: A Python-based automation bot that streamlines repetitive tasks, data processing, and report generation for business workflows.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, featuring smooth animations, dark theme, and optimized performance.
